pullRequest.title: Fix #6045: Cookies add security if over HTTPS
pullRequest.bodyText:
removed deprecated jquery.cookie.js plugin
upgraded to js.cookie which is the pure Javascript successor library to jquery.cookie and supports SameSite
Add missing stateful documentation of Carousel
Fix JsDocof browser plugin
Tested in IE11, Edge, Firefox and Chrome

@blutorange please review my JSDoc changes I think I did it right
@ravihariharan this goes along with your other fix
